summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2002 LEXUS RX300. WHENEVER THE CONTACT ATTEMPTED TO COME TO A COMPLETE STOP, HE NOTICED THAT THE RPM'S SUDDENLY INCREASED CAUSING THE VEHICLE TO LUNGE FORWARD EVEN WHEN THE BRAKES WERE APPLIED. THE CONTACT PREVIOUSLY NOTICED THAT ALL OF THE DASHBOARD WARNING LIGHTS ILLUMINATED FOR SEVERAL DAYS AND THEN SHUT OFF WITHOUT BEING SERVICED. THE VEHICLE HAS NOT BEEN DIAGNOSED BY THE DEALERSHIP. THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE 174000.       UPDATED 3/24/10 *CN  THE CONSUMER STATED HE EXPERIENCED SUDDEN ACCELERATION SEVERAL TIMES. UPDATED 06/17/10*JB
